title: Discovery & Requirements
content: Align stakeholders and clarify outcomes. Capture functional and nonâ€‘functional requirements, assess constraints, and define measurable success criteria.

title: Solution Architecture
content: Design target architecture and delivery plan. Select frameworks and cloud services, define data models and integration patterns, and establish CI/CD, security, and observability standards.

title: Implementation & Delivery
content: Iterative development with automated testing and reviews. Track performance and reliability, manage releases, and hand over with documentation and knowledge transfer.
